meanings.definition: An enzyme that breaks down fats into fatty acids and glycerol.
meanings.sent1: The lipase in my stomach helps to break down the fats from my food.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained how lipase works to break down fats in our bodies.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if lipase ever gets tired of breaking down all those fats.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like lipase, breaking down any obstacles in her way.
meanings.sent5: The lipase enzyme is like a tiny worker tirelessly dismantling fats.

meanings.definition: A protein that aids in the digestion of lipids.
meanings.sent1: The lipase in my body helps me digest the fats I eat.
meanings.sent2: We learned in biology class about the role of lipase in digesting lipids.
meanings.sent3: The lipase protein must be a superhero for breaking down all those fats.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge was a lipase, helping her digest complex information effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The lipase protein is like a key that unlocks the nutrients in fats.

meanings.definition: A substance that helps the body absorb and utilize fats.
meanings.sent1: Including lipase-rich foods in your diet can aid in fat absorption.
meanings.sent2: The nutritionist explained how lipase helps the body utilize fats efficiently.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could sprinkle some lipase on my food to make it easier to absorb fats.
meanings.sent4: Her positivity acted like lipase, helping her body make the most of every nutrient.
meanings.sent5: Lipase is like a helpful guide that shows fats the way to be used by the body.
